# iosxr_cef (Data Source)

This data source can read the CEF configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_cef" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `adjacency_route_override_rib` (Boolean) Set options for adjacency routes overriding RIB routes
- `consistent_hashing_auto_recovery` (Boolean) Automatically recover to previous hash state
- `encap_sharing_disable` (Boolean) Use this in conjunction with BGP per-prefix label mode
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `load_balancing_mode_hierarchical_ecmp_min_paths` (Number) Minimum paths for qualifying HLB. Paths exceeding the configured value will be installed in HLB mode
- `load_balancing_mode_hierarchical_ucmp_group_size` (Number) UCMP group size for HLB
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb` (Boolean) OOR handling configuration
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb_max_duration` (Number) max-duration time configuration
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_resource_threshold` (Number) percentage threshold parameter
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dlb_resource_threshold` (Number) percentage threshold parameter
- `ltrace_multiplier` (Number) ltrace multiplier
- `platform_lsm_frr_holdtime` (Number) Time to keep FRR slots programmed post FRR
- `proactive_arp_nd_enable` (Boolean) Enable proactive ARP/ND feature
- `retry_service_time` (Number) Retry service time (default 50 msec)
- `retry_syslog_timer` (Number) Syslog timer in seconds(default 120 seconds), 0 to disable
- `retry_timeout` (Number) Retry timeout (default 15 msec)
